clir.model

Class LanguageFolder

  • java.lang.Object
    • clir.model.LanguageFolder

  • public class LanguageFolder
extends Object
    A POJO to keep together a language and a folder. Useful for keeping an repository, index and query folders next to the languages.
    Author:
    Gabriel
